title: PSYCH 490 • Spring 2025
text: This course focuses on the psychology of data visualization or what makes a good, compelling, understandable data picture.

title: PSYCH 490 • Spring 2025
text:
Canvas site
We will use Canvas to submit assignments and grade them. The Canvas site may be found here:

Most of the course content will be found on this site.

title: PSYCH 490 • Spring 2025
text:
Course structure
This is a discussion-focused course. On most days we will discuss readings assigned prior to class. On many Fridays and a few Mondays, we will work together or individually on the assigned exercises, the final project, or another assignment.

title: Resources
text:
This page captures some of the resources Rick Gilmore found in developing this course.



Psychology 6135: Psychology of Data Visualization, http://euclid.psych.yorku.ca/www/psy6135/index.html, by Michael Friendly at York University.
Friendly might be a good guest.
